Room.Name: Taragon Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Taragon Road, a wide dirt road near some large storage barns.
Room.LongDescription: The barns you see contain food and other necessities in the event of a long-term siege. Once, about six hundred years ago, the village was attacked by mountain trolls and the residents almost starved before they drove the trolls away. Since that time, the village has stored just about anything you can imagine in there.
